text: The new ACR guidance on #COVID19 #vaccine use in patients with rheumatic disease will be reviewed during a town hall on Feb. 16, 7:30–8:30 PM ET. The town hall will be recorded & posted to the ACR website for those unable to attend. Register today → https://t.co/tT00W4h5Ks https://t.co/QAjJTYnASJ
